name: SensibleConfig

skipMinify.description: put on to true if minify doesn't work, so it will be skipped by `rebuildOperation`

isSensibleProject.description:
If true, this is the root of a typerepo

TODO: check if we can deprecate this

hasGeneratedDependencies.description: If true, it means that this operation has dependency on one or more operations that have been generated. We need to know this because it can easily cause circular imports if we don't filter them out sometimes

appPort.description:
If the operation exposes an app on a port (can be both a server or frontend), we can specify the port it should run on.

This is especially useful to connect the port to something that's running.

By convention, for King OS, these ports should be unique and on the 42xx range

isNotSdkable.description: If set to true, this operation will not be included into the SDKs

schema.fullComment: put on to true if minify doesn't work, so it will be skipped by `rebuildOperation`

If true, this is the root of a typerepo

TODO: check if we can deprecate this
schema.todo: check if we can deprecate this

schema.fullComment: If true, it means that this operation has dependency on one or more operations that have been generated. We need to know this because it can easily cause circular imports if we don't filter them out sometimes

If the operation exposes an app on a port (can be both a server or frontend), we can specify the port it should run on.

This is especially useful to connect the port to something that's running.

By convention, for King OS, these ports should be unique and on the 42xx range
If set to true, this operation will not be included into the SDKs
